offset.description: Column offset on the left side – number of columns that should be left empty before this column
offset.description_zh: Column offset on the left side – 在此列之前应留空的列数

order.description: Column order, can be used to reorder columns at different viewport sizes
order.description_zh: 列顺序，可用于对不同视区大小的列进行重新排序
